snippet: As part of a closely watched unionization drive, workers in Chattanooga will decide next week whether to join the United Automobile Workers.
abstract: Volkswagen announces, as part of a closely watched unionization drive, that 1,600 workers at its assembly plant in Chattanooga, Tenn, will vote on whether to join the United Automobile Workers.
lead_paragraph: As part of a closely watched unionization drive, workers in Chattanooga will decide next week whether to join the United Automobile Workers.

headline.main: VW Workers in Tennessee to Vote on Union
headline.print_headline: VW Workers in Tennessee to Vote on Joining Union
